verbose_text: As has been noted by Nan et al., miR-451 can affect the invasion and survival of cells via the regulation of target proteins, including Bcl-2, suggesting that the miR-451 could lead to an inhibition of Bcl-2 mRNA translation through the binding of its 3 ' untranslated region, thus down-regulating the expression of Bcl-2 protein [XREF_BIBR].
